value.title: StarCraft 2: STORM DROPS! (MaNa vs SpeCial)
value.excerpt: Amazing game of professional Terran versus Protoss in StarCraft 2. This game is a constant back-and-forth between some of the best players outside of South Korea. One of the highlights are multiple storm drops that the Protoss player executes with a Warp Prism and several High Templar with Psionic Storm.
